TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit NumberSubstitution extends System.Object

summary.span: 指定文字中的數字於不同文化特性中的顯示方式。

span.span: Specifies how numbers in text are displayed in different cultures.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 大部分的文化特性會使用十進位系統來表示數字，但許多的文化特性使用不同的數字形狀。Most cultures use the decimal system to represent numbers, but many cultures use different digit shapes. 下表顯示數個不同的文化特性所使用的編號系統。The following table shows several numbering systems used by different cultures. ![數字替換圖像一覽表](~/add/media/numbersubstitution01.png "數字替換圖像一覽表")![Table of number substitution glyphs](~/add/media/numbersubstitution01.png "Table of number substitution glyphs") 在不同文化特性的數字的外觀的範例Example of the appearance of digits in different cultures 因為與不同的是字母、 數字用於計算不足夠的數字形狀，每一組提供替代的 Unicode 字碼指標。It is not sufficient to provide alternate Unicode code points for each set of digit shapes, because, unlike letters, digits are used in calculations. 每個應用程式、 每個作業系統，以及每個執行階段程式庫包含程式碼，專門用來將內部的二進位格式的數值轉換成字元字串，反之亦然。Every application, every operating system, and every run-time library contains code dedicated to converting an internal binary format numeric value to a string of characters, and vice versa. 這些轉換常式會被編碼為使用 Unicode 數字 」 0030"到"0039 」。These conversion routines are coded to use Unicode digits "0030" through "0039". 類別提供的功能，可讓不同的文化特性，以在轉譯階段取代適當的數字形狀。The class provides functionality that allows different cultures to substitute the appropriate digit shapes at rendering time. 這項功能很類似提供字型替換和語言相關字型呈現時所用的。This functionality is similar to the one used for providing font substitution and language dependent font rendering. > [!NOTE] > 許多文化特性會捨棄其傳統數字的圖形，並採用西式數字的圖形，因此數字取代功能會辨識各文化特性的傳統數字形狀與國際標準數字之間的差異。Many cultures are discarding their traditional digits shapes and adopting Western digits shapes, therefore the number substitution functionality recognizes the distinction for each culture between traditional digit shapes and national standard digit shapes. ## XAML 文字使用方式XAML Text Usage 此類型通常不會使用在[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]化為物件項目。This type is not typically used in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] as an object element. 不過，類型會公開數個可以設定其他有文字內容的物件項目的附加的屬性。However, the type exposes several attached properties that can be set on other object elements that have text content.

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 取得或設定當 屬性的數值設定為 時，能識別使用何種文化特性的數值。

span.span: Gets or sets a value which identifies which culture to use when the value of the property is set to .

value.span: 代表用為覆寫之文化特性的值 。

span.span: A value that represents the culture that is used as an override.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 預設值屬性是`null`，這樣就會解譯為 「 en-我們"（英文-美國） 文化特性。The default value of the property is `null`, which is interpreted as the "en-us" (United States English) culture. 如果未設為，會忽略這個屬性。If is not set to , this property is ignored. 本參考頁面代表兩個同名但完全相等的使用方式，屬性：This reference page represents two identically named but not entirely equivalent usages for the property: - 您可以設定這個屬性在程式碼執行個體，做為[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]屬性。You can set this property in code on a instance, as a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] property. 在這種用法，相依性屬性識別項不支援的屬性，做為後盾的私用欄位，並不能做為相依性屬性。In this usage, the property is not backed by a dependency property identifier, it is backed by a private field and does not act as a dependency property. - 您可以設定此屬性為附加的屬性使用方式，在[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]。You can set this property as an attached property usage in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]. 因為附加的屬性做為後盾的相依性屬性識別項，所以這個屬性具有相依性屬性資訊區段中，原因是附加的屬性使用方式。The attached property usage is the reason why this property has a Dependency Property Information section, because the attached property is backed by a dependency property identifier. 在 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]，使用量`<`*物件* **NumberSubstitution.CultureOverride**`="`*值*`".../>`，其中*物件*為物件項目，其中指定的數字替代邏輯也適用於，及*值*是其中一個字串格式的值，如下所述在 XAML 中的值。In [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)], the usage is `<`*object* **NumberSubstitution.CultureOverride**`="`*value*`".../>`, where *object* is an object element where the specified number substitution logic applies, and *value* is one of the string-format values as explained in XAML Values. 在程式碼，附加的屬性使用方式受到和。In code, the attached property usage is supported by and . ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage ```

An enumerated value of .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 預設值屬性是，這是文字執行的文化特性。The default value of the property is , which is the culture of the text run. 本參考頁面代表兩個同名但完全相等的使用方式，屬性：This reference page represents two identically named but not entirely equivalent usages for the property: - 您可以設定這個屬性在程式碼執行個體，做為[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]屬性。You can set this property in code on a instance, as a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] property. 在這種用法，相依性屬性識別項不支援的屬性，做為後盾的私用欄位，並不能做為相依性屬性。In this usage, the property is not backed by a dependency property identifier, it is backed by a private field and does not act as a dependency property. - 您可以設定此屬性為附加的屬性使用方式，在[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]。You can set this property as an attached property usage in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]. 因為附加的屬性做為後盾的相依性屬性識別項，所以這個屬性具有相依性屬性資訊區段中，原因是附加的屬性使用方式。The attached property usage is the reason why this property has a Dependency Property Information section, because the attached property is backed by a dependency property identifier. 在 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]，使用量`<`*物件* **NumberSubstitution.CultureSource**`="`*值*`".../>`，其中*物件*為物件項目，其中指定的數字替代邏輯也適用於，及*值*字串表示法值。In [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)], the usage is `<`*object* **NumberSubstitution.CultureSource**`="`*value*`".../>`, where *object* is an object element where the specified number substitution logic applies, and *value* is a string representation of a value. 在程式碼，附加的屬性使用方式受到和。In code, the attached property usage is supported by and . ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage \<*object* **NumberSubstitution.CultureSource**=""/>\<*object* **NumberSubstitution.CultureSource**=""/> ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None|

summary.span: 取得或設定值，這個值識別用來判斷數字替代的替代方法。

span.span: Gets or sets a value which identifies the substitution method that is used to determine number substitution.
An enumerated value of .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 預設值屬性是，指定應該由決定取代方法根據數字的文化特性屬性值。The default value of the property is , which specifies that the substitution method should be determined based on the number culture's property value. 本參考頁面代表兩個同名但完全相等的使用方式，屬性：This reference page represents two identically named but not entirely equivalent usages for the property: - 您可以設定這個屬性在程式碼執行個體，做為[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]屬性。You can set this property in code on a instance, as a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] property. 在這種用法，相依性屬性識別項不支援的屬性，做為後盾的私用欄位，並不能做為相依性屬性。In this usage, the property is not backed by a dependency property identifier, it is backed by a private field and does not act as a dependency property. - 您可以設定此屬性為附加的屬性使用方式，在[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]。You can set this property as an attached property usage in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]. 因為附加的屬性做為後盾的相依性屬性識別項，所以這個屬性具有相依性屬性資訊區段中，原因是附加的屬性使用方式。The attached property usage is the reason why this property has a Dependency Property Information section, because the attached property is backed by a dependency property identifier. 在 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]，使用量`<`*物件* **NumberSubstitution.Substitution**`="`*值*`".../>`，其中*物件*為物件項目，其中指定的數字替代邏輯也適用於，及*值*字串表示法值。In [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)], the usage is `<`*object* **NumberSubstitution.Substitution**`="`*value*`".../>`, where *object* is an object element where the specified number substitution logic applies, and *value* is a string representation of a value. 在程式碼，附加的屬性使用方式受到和。In code, the attached property usage is supported by and . ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage \<*object* **NumberSubstitution.Substitution**=""/>\<*object* **NumberSubstitution.Substitution**=""/> ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None|
